welcome_message_body: "Welcome to As, Czechia! This charming city is known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and indulge in all that As has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hof Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Hof Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
